items: Find a sturdy table or bench that can support your weight.
Lie down on your back underneath the table or bench.
Reach up and grab the edge of the table or bench with both hands, palms facing towards your feet.
Engage your core and glutes to lift your hips off the ground, creating a straight line from your shoulders to your feet.
Pull your chest towards the table or bench, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Lower yourself back down to the starting position with control.
Repeat for desired number of repetitions.
Improves cardiovascular endurance
Increases lower body strength and power
Improves coordination and agility
Burns calories and aids in weight loss
Can be done anywhere with minimal equipment
